review: Faster than any other streaming device I've tried... Nice display, easy to use, simple remote
author: Jennifer Wolfe

review: so far it works well with some delays.

review: What a life changer! We use this everyday to catch up on shows and movies we miss out on now that we have a baby at home.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great. Save some $ not buying a smart TV and just attaching one of these. Only negatives: slow start-up and it requires a USB port to power. I would buy again!
author: Chris

review: Caused the picture in my tv to go out. Ended up having to get a new tv and got a smart tv, didn't need the fire stick thankfully
author: Ang

review: Great device, easy to set up and easy to use!
author: NLL16
